ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Spare_Vehicle_Delivery_Time__c )), NOT(ISBLANK( Spare_Vehicle_Returning_Time__c )), Spare_Vehicle_Delivery_Time__c = Spare_Vehicle_Returning_Time__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Spare Vehicle Delivery Time and Spare Vehicle Returning Time must not be the same.
